MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar affecting properties in Greystone Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.40am. Our engineers have arrived at the Scott Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.50am on the 19th of October 2020.
